Package com.davidbracewell.parsing

Pratt parsing framework

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasLexicalPattern  
    Lexer
    A Lexer tokenizes a string or resource into tokens.
    ParserTokenType
    Defines a type associated with a token.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Evaluator<O>
    An evaluator provides a switch-like interface for evaluating expressions.
    ExpressionIterator
    Provides a way to iterate over expressions resulting from parsing a token stream.
    Grammar
    A grammar representing the rules for parsing.
    LexicalPattern
    Methodology to find matches for patterns in CharSequences
    Parser
    An implementation of a Pratt Parser inspired by Pratt Parsers: Expression Parsing Made Easy.
    ParserToken
    A parse token from a Lexer to be used in a Parser
    ParserTokenStream
    Represents a stream of tokens from a Lexer.
    PatternLexer
    A lexer that uses LexicalPatterns in a longest match wins strategy.
    PatternLexer.Builder
    Builder class for PatternLexers.
    RegularExpressionLexer
    An implementation of a lexer that uses regular expressions to tokenize a String into a ParserTokenStream.
    RegularExpressionLexer.Builder
    A builder for constructing Lexers
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommonTypes
    A enum of common Parser Token Types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParseException  

Package com.davidbracewell.parsing Description

Pratt parsing framework
